Package main.roles.repositories

Interface Events

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventsInMemory, EventsJson
public interface Events
Interface for managing Event entities.

  • Method Details

    • register

      void register(Event event)
      Registers a new event.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to be registered

    • update

      void update(Event event)
      Updates an existing event.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to be updated

    • byId

      Optional<Event> byId(EventId id)
      Retrieves an event by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the event
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the event if found, or empty if not found

    • event

      Optional<Event> event(String title, LocalDate date)
      Retrieves an event by its title and date.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the event
      date - the date of the event
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the event if found, or empty if not found

    • list

      List<Event> list()
      Lists all events.
      Returns:
      a list of all events

    • availableOn

      List<Event> availableOn(LocalDate date)
      Lists all events available on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to check for available events
      Returns:
      a list of events available on the specified date

    • has

      boolean has(EventId id)
      Checks if an event exists by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the event
      Returns:
      true if the event exists, false otherwise

    • has

      boolean has(String title, LocalDate inDate)
      Checks if an event exists by its title and date.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the event
      inDate - the date of the event
      Returns:
      true if the event exists, false otherwise
